attributes.comment:
To whom it may concern:
I am disappointed to here about the increase for the I-600A form Petition to
Classify Orphan as an Immediate Relative. I could understand a $20 to $50
increase but $125?? That's a huge increase, 23% I believe. Due to the long wait
for our adoption we will have to renew our forms and fingerprints, we will have to
pay for this service again and now at a even greater expense. If the US
Immigration dept. needs more money to run their programs I don't think we should
have to fund it straight from our pockets, we already pay taxes. Thanks for your
consideration in this matter.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Tammy Beaird
